greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of odd proper divisors of n. Sum of the odd divisors of n that are less than n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences related to sums of divisors
formula: If n is odd, a(n) = A000593(n) - n; if n is even, a(n) = A000593(n). - _Michel Marcus_, Jan 14 2014
example: E.g. the sum of odd divisors of 9 that are less than 9 is 4=1+3.
program: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n , d, (d%2) * (d<n) * d); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 14 2014
results.author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_, Mar 04 2004
